Translations.Text: Tamen de zhu [an la] yi ta de ci min, xiyue he leyuan xiang tamen baoxi, tamen zai leyuan li jiang xiangshou yongjiu de kuaile [zhu],
[tamen jiang] yong ju qizhong. Zai an la nali que you zhongda de baochou.
Xinshimen a! Jiaru nimen de fuqin he xiongdi fangqi xinyang er xuan zhai bu xinyang, name, nimen jiu buyao yi tamen wei you. Nimen zhong shei yi tamen wei you, zhexie ren que shi bu yi zhe.

Ni shuo:“Jiaru nimen de fuqin, erzi, xiongdi, qizi, qinqi, nimen suo zhuan qu de caifu, nimen haipa diejia de maoyi he nimen suo xihuan de zhuzhai, dui nimen lai shuo bi an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng] he wei an la zhi dao fendou [zhu] zhe geng ke'ai, name, nimen dengdai ba! Zhidao an la zhixing ta de mingling. An la jue bu yindao beini de minzhong.”

An la que yi zai xuduo zhanchang shang he hou nai yin zhanyi zhi ri shi nimen shengli. Dangshi, nimen wei ziji renshu zhongduo er jiao'ao, dan renshu zhongduo dui nimen que hao wu yichu; dadi sui liaokuo, dan ta que dui nimen bian xiazhaile, nimen zhongyu baibei.
Zhihou, an la jiang anning gei ta de shizhe [mu sheng] he xinshimen, bing jiangxia nimen suo kan bujian de jundui [tianshi], qie cheng fa liao bu xinyang zhe. Zhe shi dui bu xinyang zhe de huan bao.
